com.cubeia.firebase.bot.ai

Class BasicAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cubeia.firebase.bot.ai.AbstractAI
      • com.cubeia.firebase.bot.ai.BasicAI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AI, StateAI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LobbyAI, ProbeBot

    public abstract class BasicAI
extends AbstractAI
    Implements some basic state handling. Extend this class to implement the game AI without having to implement state logic and execution handling. Created on 2006-sep-28
    Author:
    Fredrik Johansson $RCSFile: $ $Revision: $ $Author: $ $Date: $

      • handleLoggedin

        protected void handleLoggedin()
        The bot was logged in successfully. Take a seat at a random table after a certain delay. This delay needs to accommodate time for a possible reseating to occur.

      • verifyTablePacketId

        public void verifyTablePacketId(int tableid)
        Description copied from interface: AI
        Check if we are seated at the given table. If not an error will be written to the log. Use this to verify correct table id on all packets that require that you are seated at a table.
